Articles.Content:
Hi Guys

Can anyone suggest to me some good mods that arent cheating (BFE 500 for example) but make the game have more varitey
Novapunch, C7 Flight Pack, White Monkey Space Rockets And Kitchenware, DownUnder.
Geesh, im wondering if anyone knows of a program so you can MAKE mods ;D
It\'s a long process of making mods. You need to model them, texture them, hitbox them. It\'s a lot.

Geesh, im wondering if anyone knows of a program so you can MAKE mods ;D

There is no single program for making mods.

There is however plenty of information about mod making in the forums, see the 'Addon Making' section of the forum.
